sentences.sContent: When the organ does appear, however, it is not only impressive in size, but its bright pink color makes it stand out against the dark fur.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the organ does appear, however, it is not only impressive in size, but its bright pink color makes it stand out against the dark fur.
sentences.sCn: 然而当这个器官出现时，不仅是在尺寸上能让人留下深刻印象，它那淡粉色的颜色更是和黑色的毛皮形成鲜明对比。

phrases.pCn: 人造革；假裘皮；仿造皮毛

words.tran: 毛皮的；盖着毛皮的；似毛皮的
毛皮制的；穿毛皮的；长着软毛的
用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装（fur的过去分词）
用毛皮衬；使生苔（fur的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: the thick soft hair that covers the bodies of some animals, such as cats, dogs, and rabbits
